General.Name: Jinzi Ham Co Ltd
General.Description: Jinzi Ham Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of fermented meat products in China and internationally. It offers golden ham, sausages, casual snacks, braised sauce, bake fillings, food and beverage, and other related meat products. The company owns cold storage. It primarily serves catering hotels and food processing companies. Jinzi Ham Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Jinhua, China.
